quote: Those in their snug Bed-chambers may call the Fears of Night meer Bugbears, but their Minds have not pierced into the Horror of the World which others, who are adrift upon it, know.
quote_letters: THOSE IN THEIR SNUG BED-CHAMBERS MAY CALL THE FEARS OF NIGHT MEER BUGBEARS BUT THEIR MINDS HAVE NOT PIERCED INTO THE HORROR OF THE WORLD WHICH OTHERS WHO ARE ADRIFT UPON IT KNOW
